title: New chapter in the life of my dog.
self_text: As a former foster I always make sure that my fosters have an adopter lined up before they go home with me but the last foster I had was a little different. A three year old chihuahua named Pepper who I thought would be easy enough for me to care for and it turns out she was not. She was super skittish and refused to come out of her crate unless someone was holding her so after about a month of getting used to me she still wasn't eating or drinking from a bowl. I took her to the vet and he said she had a heart murmur and it might get worse over time and there was nothing he could do to fix it. After about a week I found her on Craigslist for $50. The people who bought her were really nice and promised to give her all the love she needed. They brought her home and kept her in a room until she was comfortable enough to eat or drink. After a few days she started eating and drinking again and after another few weeks she was a happy healthy pup. She went through a lot of training and socialization and now she's living with her new family. My family has been planning to adopt her as their own for a while now. So I decided to take the step and bring her home as my own. And let me tell you, I wouldn't trade her for anything. We've had a long road together but she's become my best friend.  The past few months have been rough though because we've been struggling to deal with her fearfulness. She has a high drive to run away and it can be scary when she disappears. I spent hours searching the neighborhood every day just hoping to find her and I don't know what I would do if something happened to her. Then yesterday she went missing and I panicked. I searched everywhere and called her name until my voice was hoarse. Just when I was starting to lose hope I heard her bark coming from under my neighbor's porch. When I got there I saw her huddled in a corner shivering. Turns out she had gotten spooked by a car and ran off. She was okay though. I'm so relieved and grateful. I know she's going to continue to need a lot of reassurance, but seeing her safe and sound made me realize how much she means to me. Love this little girl! ‚ù§Ô∏èüê∂ #rescuedog #chihuahua #doglove #happilyeverafter #rescuefamily "

title: New idea for a challenge?
self_text: I was thinking about the challenges in Elden Ring and wanted to come up with something new. Every time we die, we have to start over from where we were when we died but with all our items still in our inventory. No healing or weapons upgrades allowed until after the death. So no starting with a full set of upgraded armor or a maxed out weapon. This would make it much more difficult and require strategic decision-making, instead of just grinding and getting stronger. Thoughts?

title: Can I play Skyrim with mods and not have the game crash?
self_text: Yes, but it's complicated.  You need a mod called Wrye Ford.  Wrye Ford does a bunch of things including fixing crashes in Skyrim and other Bethesda games (Fallout 4, Fallout 76, etc.).  It takes a bit of work to set up, but once it's working properly, it will make your game stable.  The main program itself doesn't do anything, but it relies on a separate utility program called xEdit (formerly TES5Edit).  xEdit is used to fix bugs in the game's files.  There's a lot more involved than just installing a few mods, so if you're new to modding, you might want to watch a few videos or read a guide before diving in.   Here are some resources for getting started:  * https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrimspecialedition/mods/10198 * https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=wL4m-d32KqU  * https://www.reddit.com/r/skyrimmods/wiki/getting_started  Let me know if you have any questions about it!

title: I need help with my dating life.
self_text: So a few weeks ago I met someone and we've been seeing each other for about a month now.  We have a lot in common and it feels like things are going great but she told me yesterday that she has been having trouble sleeping because she hasn't had her boyfriend around lately. She said that she missed him and wanted him to come over and spend the night but he was busy so she ended up getting really sad.   I tried telling her I would try to make time to see her more often but she just said that "it wasn't enough"  She didn't mention anything about wanting to break up or anything but I'm starting to get worried.  I am a pretty bad communicator and I think I probably did something wrong here by not mentioning that I was also feeling nervous about how to navigate this situation and I also thought that if I made too much of an effort to meet her then I'd seem too eager or intense. Is there any way to tell her how I feel without making her feel worse? Any advice is appreciated!

title: Am I the only one who‚Äôs having trouble with the new gameplay mechanic?
self_text: So for those who don‚Äôt know about it, we can now use the weapon upgrade system. We can craft and upgrade weapons by using materials that we find in the game. The problem is that it takes like 20-30 minutes just to get enough resources to craft a single weapon upgrade.  It took me 6 hours to get enough scrap metal to upgrade my sword, which was the first time I used it. This has really made the early game feel slow and boring. Is anyone else finding this frustrating or is it just me?  Edit: Thanks guys! I was wondering if I was the only one.

title: My girlfriend just dumped me because I wanted a cat and she has allergies

I know that isn't the full story. But I'm feeling really awful and just needed to vent.  I have been wanting a cat forever, and she always told me she was fine with it. She actually said she was fine with me getting a cat as long as it was spayed and neutered and I would take care of all expenses and do all the cleaning. I have a good job, plenty of money, and am capable of taking care of an animal. The problem is that I never got around to doing anything about it, and she assumed I wouldn't. Now she says she wants to be with someone who's willing to make sacrifices. What do I do? Do I need to get a cat anyway if I'm serious about her? Am I being selfish? Should I just give up on the idea of ever having a pet?

self_text: I have been having a really bad sleep schedule for a while now. Started because I was trying to get into gaming but now it‚Äôs just taking over my life. I used to be able to fall asleep at any time but recently I can‚Äôt even do that anymore. I‚Äôm tired all day and it‚Äôs getting hard to focus in school/work. I don‚Äôt want to take medication so i‚Äôd love to hear some tips from others who have struggled with sleep schedules. Any advice?

title: Did anyone else get a new account?
self_text: I have been playing since 2013 and haven't played in over a year. I got a new computer recently and had to reinstall the game. So now I have a new account and I don't know if anyone will remember me from back when I was an active player. If so then hey! :)

title: I‚Äôm broke and can't afford to buy new clothes so could anyone help me pick out a few decent outfits for the next month?
self_text: My closet is pretty sad tbh but I got a job so it should be easier to make money now. I need 3-4 outfits that would work for school/work (it‚Äôs a computer repair shop) + some casual stuff like jeans with tshirts or hoodies. Can't spend more than $50 total

title: I need help with a game I'm playing
self_text: So I have been trying to play the new game I got and its not working because my phone is constantly telling me that I'm out of data and it won't let me continue playing without purchasing more data.  I don't want to buy more data but I really want to play the game so what do I do? Do I just wait until I get more data or am I going to be stuck like this forever?  What about turning off my internet for when I'm playing? Is that possible?  Any help would be appreciated.

title: I'm not sure if my girlfriend wants me to get a new job or not
self_text: She says she thinks it would be good for me to find something better but she also doesn't want me to leave her and she told me she's worried about how our lives will change with a new job

title: Help me with my dating life pls.
self_text: I'm 25 and never been in a relationship. My friends have all been married or have kids so I feel like an outsider. The thing is i have the confidence and am not shy, just can't seem to initiate anything, even if it's something as simple as asking someone out for coffee. Any tips?

title: Am I the only one who feels like I am getting worse?
self_text: Hey guys, I'm really worried about my mental health lately. I have been feeling increasingly depressed and anxious over the past few weeks. I have a pretty bad case of depression (I was diagnosed 5 years ago) but it usually goes away after I take my meds. I feel like the worst case of depression I've had in a long time. My meds haven't helped me at all in the last week or so and I just want to stay in bed all day and not do anything. Is anyone else having similar experiences?  Reddit users say they can help with depression, but how do I know if they are qualified to provide help? And more importantly - what even is therapy?

title: Do you think we'll get a new DLC?
self_text: I'm really hoping for a new DLC in the future but what do you guys think?

title: Overthinking the first chapter
self_text: Guys I'm really getting caught up in overthinking the first chapter of my book and it's making me want to give up on writing it altogether.  It's not even a difficult chapter, just feels clunky and doesn't really get going until much later. Do any of you guys have any tips or suggestions for how to fix that?

title: Is there a way to get rid of the nagging feeling that I'm missing out on something?
self_text: (Not sure if I should post here or not but needed to vent) My wife and I have been having this nagging feeling lately that we're missing out on something. We haven't had a weekend trip in over a year due to covid and now it's just feels like we're stuck in our routines. Our friends are always doing fun stuff and we feel bad that we don't do as much with them anymore.  Is this normal? Any tips for getting over this feeling of FOMO?

title: Am I being a jerk?
self_text: My roommate and I had been planning on going camping for the weekend and he asked if I wanted to bring my dog but I said no because he doesn't like dogs. He replied back saying "that's fine but you can't come either" then went off and did his own thing. When I got home he was at the kitchen table playing video games and didn't even acknowledge me.  I asked him what he meant by not coming and he just shrugged and said "it was cool with me if you stayed home." I felt so weird about it and was wondering if I was being a jerk asking why he wasn't acknowledging me or why he hadn't said anything else. Am I being a jerk?

title: My wife and I were discussing what our plans for the future would be. She wants to move out in a year and start her own business. I don't want her to leave me.  self_text: Should I give up my dream to be with her? We both love each other but I'm not sure how long we can make it work.  subreddit: relationships<eos>
I need help!
self_text: Is there anyone who has had a panic attack and knows how to get over it? I was on the train, everything was fine, then suddenly i got an intense panic attack. I have never had anything like that before. I don't know what happened or why but I felt so panicked that I had to get off the train at the next station and sit down in a coffee shop until i could calm down. I am now back home and feeling kinda okay, but really anxious about it all happening again. Do any of you guys ever have something like this happen? How do you get over it?  I can't sleep as i keep thinking about it. I'm just generally scared of having another panic attack.

title: I am feeling a little bit down today
self_text: I feel like nothing i do is good enough.  I'm not the best student, I'm a terrible driver and my parents have been nagging me about getting a job for months now.  I'm just feeling really bad about myself today.  Anyone wanna talk?

title: How do I get rid of my in-laws?
self_text: My in-laws are toxic and they ruin every family event I go to.  They're always trying to tell me how to do things wrong, insult me, and generally just make everyone miserable. I don't want to cut them out of my life completely but I can't stand being around them. Any tips on how to limit contact with them without causing a huge blowup? Do I need to talk to my spouse about it first?   Is there anything I can say to them that will actually make them stop bothering me? I'm at the end of my rope here.  Any advice appreciated!

title: Advice for someone who just got fired?
self_text: I just got fired from my job today and honestly I am still in shock.  I was working as a software engineer at a small company and i got let go because they said the company was running out of money. I have been working there for about 3 years and did well but it's honestly just devastating.  I don't know what to do next or where to start looking for jobs.  How should i go about it?  I don't want to take any stupid steps so i figured i would ask for advice here.

title: Is it possible to get my roommate to stop playing online games in their bedroom?
self_text: He plays online video games all day and night in his room. I can hear him gaming when I am trying to study or sleep.  I have asked him politely several times to play his games in a different room, but he refused. He says that he needs to do it in his room.  It‚Äôs affecting my life because I cannot concentrate on school.  I don‚Äôt want to argue with him, so I was wondering if there‚Äôs any way to get him to move.  Any suggestions?

title: How do I get my dad to stop yelling at me?
self_text: My dad yells at me a lot when he gets mad. Sometimes it‚Äôs about something small like forgetting to take out the trash and other times it's over bigger stuff like not doing chores. He never apologizes after his yelling fits and just keeps yelling at me and sometimes even insults me.  I don‚Äôt know how to tell him he needs to stop yelling at me or if he will ever stop.  How can I make him stop yelling at me?

title: I need help with my girlfriend and her mom
self_text: My girlfriend and her mom have been fighting about me ever since we started dating. They say I'm too busy, that i don't call enough or visit them enough, they want to know everything about my life, even stuff that doesn't concern them (like my work or how i spent my weekend), etc. She told me she can't do it anymore and wants to break up because of her mom. I am doing everything they ask for, but it feels like nothing I do is good enough. What should I do?

title: Is it okay for my boyfriend to want me to be his girlfriend but not want to commit?
self_text: I've been with him for about 6 months and we're really close. He says he wants to be my boyfriend but doesn't want to get married or move in together.  I don't know what to do.  Is there something wrong with him? Am I being too pushy?  Am I just overthinking things?

title: Anyone else have a baby?
self_text: I got a kid yesterday and my life has changed completely.  I'm not sure how to balance everything but here's the thing. I was on a roll with my main deck (which I don't want to share) and now all I can do is play this stupid card game.  Is there any way for me to get back to playing my main deck or is it time to just give up?

title: Is it possible for a character in the game to have multiple genders?
self_text: Like, not just a gender change at the start of the game, but actually being able to switch between genders as they please, or having more than one gender associated with them. (I know it's a silly idea)

title: Am I the only one who got depressed from playing apex?
self_text: I'm an avid player but lately I can't get into it anymore and my mood has been awful ever since I played it.  I don't even know why I play it anymore. Is anyone else feeling like this?  I don't want to quit completely but i can't see myself getting back into it anytime soon.  I'd love to hear other players experiences.

title: Can I get a refund for this game?
self_text: I just got my new Xbox and started playing the game but after about an hour or two I realized it was not what I wanted and now I want to cancel my purchase. Is there any way to do that?

self_text: I'm making a new character in Skyrim and am having trouble coming up with a name. The character is male and a warrior/mage hybrid.  I want something that sounds cool but also makes sense for the character.   Suggestions?

title: New week, new challenges!
self_text: So I am still struggling with my job and it's affecting me a lot. But I feel like I need something else to keep me occupied and distracted. My plan for today is to try to find a cool activity or hobby to do on the side. Anything would be great.  I was thinking about getting into painting but I don't know where to start. Any suggestions?

title: Can I ask for help?
self_text: I am a really bad person. I have been in the past and still am a terrible friend, partner, sibling, child, etc. I hate myself and want to die but I don't want to hurt anyone else.  I was recently told by my therapist that I need to start making amends with people I have hurt. The only issue is that I can't remember most of them or what happened. I know I have done a lot of horrible things but I just don't remember most of it. And even when I do remember I feel like there is no way to make up for it. How should I go about fixing things?  How should I even start? Do I just try to apologize to everyone?   And if I am not able to make amends, how do I get over feeling so awful?

title: Can anyone help me with a problem?
self_text: I have been having trouble finding my place in the world lately and I am feeling really down. I don't know what to do. Is there any way for me to get out of this rut?

title: Do any of you have an idea what's happening with the December DLC?
self_text: I'm really confused about it and would like to know if anyone else is or if they have any ideas

title: Looking for a female friend
self_text: I'm 23 years old and looking for a female friend in my area (Phoenix Arizona) I love gaming and anime but i'm not super into sports or outdoor activities. I'm a bit of an introvert so i like hanging out at home and talking about my interests or just chillin together.  I have a dog named Maxie who i love and would want to meet as well if it was appropriate.  If interested please DM me with your age/interests etc.

title: Am I being too hard on my wife?
self_text: We've been married for 5 years and she's always been a little clingy but lately it's gotten worse. She wants me around all the time and gets mad when I spend an hour or two away from her without texting me every five minutes. I don't want to be rude or anything, but I feel like I have no freedom and can't even go out with friends. I just need some space to do things I enjoy and it makes me sad because I love her so much and don't want to hurt her feelings. How can I tell her what I'm feeling without making her feel like I'm pushing her away? Should I see a therapist about this?

title: Help me get over my trauma
self_text: I was in a car accident last year and while everyone was fine (no serious injuries) the car was totaled and i had PTSD from it. My mom still has nightmares about it, and I have bad flashbacks and am extremely anxious now whenever i even think about cars. I got new wheels but i dont want to drive them because i associate them with the accident. Any tips on how to get over this?

self_text: Anyone have any ideas what I can do? It happens every 10 minutes at least on a 1200 dollar PC with top of the line components. I already checked my drivers, updated everything, did a clean install, etc‚Ä¶  I just want to be able to play again without spending $1200 again. Any help would be appreciated.

I just need somebody to talk to, not give advice or anything.  I just want to vent.  If there‚Äôs anyone out there that could possibly listen, please tell me.
